entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 7:33 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of rain beginning early in the afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 7:33 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
